body: This beautiful adaptation of what would happen if Nariyuki had balls is truly amazing. I hope to see more of this multiwork series in the future. Sensei was my favorite at first and this just reinforces this idea. 10/10
Heads up... the translator fucked up the TL of the Asumi page severely.  It is actually Hiroyuki who lost his Vcard to her and it happened to be her first time too.  Idk how they got it so wrong...
did the author skipped best girl Asumi rip D:

Bruh, how many IQs do you need to be able to make youself believe that you are being fuck both physically AND mentally.
If 140 IQ is all you need then Imma hit the books so fast it's fast as I'm gonna ram day ass.

What's with the unnecessary scene with Asumi on page 5? Seems out of place, and TMI. I like her and all, but this story has nothing to do with her and I don't care to see who or how many times she was fucked.
